review_title: TERRIBLE PLACE, DO NOT WORK HERE
pros: Nothing, its a terrible place to work. Do not work here. Apply somewhere else. Benefits suck, the union sucks, management sucks, the ceo sucks, everything sucks. The only pro here is when you get to clock out and leave. Thats it, thats the only pro. This place sucks, and the managers are inept
cons:
Terrible management
Terrible pay
Corrupt HR, they're all friends with the terrible managers that cause problems
They only care about the image, they dont care if the employees are dissatisfied. 
Terrible and corrupt money hungry ceo
Outdated equipment
Bad conditions
Terrible benefits
They fire good employees but keep the brown nosers
Everything here sucks
Nobody likes it here

pros: compensation, benefits, friendly coworkers and staff, room for advancement
cons: since i left, there have been some cuts to nursing etc. census count is down

review_title: Overall, I've had a nice experience during my time here.
pros: Friendly community and friendly people for the most part
cons: Two unions and a management team make relations among employees difficult sometimes (people must play by different rules than the person working next to them frequently).

pros:
Team atmosphere on the psych unit. 
Union.
Good hourly rate.
cons:
Other units are vicious, it is every man for themselves.
Units do not work well together.
Management does not ask for employees opinions, nor do they want to hear them.

job_title: Home Health Care Coordinator in Warren, PA
